Prettiest restaurant with the most affordable price in Mohammadpur!
.
Presenting to you, Cheez & Beanz, a cozy place with a European vibe. I tried the following items which were highly upto the mark!
.
тЬУ SIZZLING BEEF
ЁЯТ╕: 590BDT+ (Medium)
Rate: 7.5/10
With a medium thick crust and a generous coating of molten cheese and pizza sauce, this pizza had a spicy flavour due to the presence of sizzled beef as toppings. Along with it, pickled jalapeno and olives were also in the pizza, bringing out a flavourful sour taste from the pizza.
.
тЬУ JAMAICAN BBQ
ЁЯТ╕: 299BDT+
Rate: 8/10
I have always been a huge fan of their set meals. The rice was highly flavorsome, with a beautiful poached egg on top and a ┬╝th of chicken grilled with it. The chicken was tender, with crispy skin coated in BBQ sauce. The sauteed vegetables tasted amazing with the entire platter as well.
.
тЬУ CHICKEN DUMPLINGS (steamed)
ЁЯТ╕: 220BDT+
Rate: 7/10
Thin dumpling sheets with delicious fillings inside it were steamed and served with a tangy sauce. The taste was amazing and I loved the texture of the wrapping.
.
So visit this restaurant and enjoy the day with your loved ones at Cheez & Beanz today!

.
